answers.answer: You could be dehydrated but that can also be a sign of diabetes. If it doesn't get better or if you notice any other things like extremely hungry or weak and shaking when not eating within a few hours then call your doctor

question: This is my 1st baby an I'm 33weeks and 3 days I woke up this morning and every 15mins ive  been drinking water bottles back to back is this normal or am I dehydrated what should I do
